parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A getter for [[setTerrainGrid]], returns the current terrain grid.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getTerrainGrid'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - terrain grid value
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_terrainGrid = [[getTerrainGrid]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[getTerrainGrid]] < 50) [[then]]
{
   [[hint]] "Grass is enabled";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setTerrainGrid]], [[viewDistance]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
